feed.title: Genshin Impact EN - info
feed.subtitle: info feed of Genshin Impact in en

entry.title: "The world remains constant over the centuries. But human life is like the dew at dawn or a bubble rising through water."
entry.content:
Hello, Travelers! Today, we will be introducing a new character, the Raiden Shogun.

Read more on "The world remains constant over the centuries. But human life is like the dew at dawn or a bubble rising through water."
entry.summary: Hello, Travelers! Today, we will be introducing a new character, the Raiden Shogun.

entry.title: Pre-Installation Function Coming Soon
entry.content:
To bring Travelers a better gaming experience, the developers will soon make a pre-installation function available on PC and mobile platforms.

Read more on Pre-Installation Function Coming Soon
entry.summary: To bring Travelers a better gaming experience, the developers will soon make a pre-installation function available on PC and mobile platforms.

entry.title: "My bow is for the service of people who need the help."
entry.content:
Today, we'd like to introduce to you a heroine from another world — Aloy!

Read more on "My bow is for the service of people who need the help."
entry.summary: Today, we'd like to introduce to you a heroine from another world — Aloy!

entry.title: Character Demo - "Aloy: Otherworldly Hunter" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
A skilled hunter is always on the prowl for new and thrilling experiences. Braving this strange new world of Teyvat will be Aloy's latest trial.

Read more on Character Demo - "Aloy: Otherworldly Hunter" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: A skilled hunter is always on the prowl for new and thrilling experiences. Braving this strange new world of Teyvat will be Aloy's latest trial.

entry.title: "To manifest Eternity per the Almighty Shogun's will — that is what I aspire to."
entry.content:
Today we'd like to introduce you a general of the Tenryou Commission — Kujou Sara!

Read more on "To manifest Eternity per the Almighty Shogun's will — that is what I aspire to."
entry.summary: Today we'd like to introduce you a general of the Tenryou Commission — Kujou Sara!

entry.title: Character Demo - "Kujou Sara: Thunderous Devotion" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
To ensure that the will of the Shogun will always be done, and to assist the Almighty Shogun in manifesting Eternity.

Read more on Character Demo - "Kujou Sara: Thunderous Devotion" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: To ensure that the will of the Shogun will always be done, and to assist the Almighty Shogun in manifesting Eternity.

entry.title: Version 2.1 "Floating World Under the Moonlight" Update Notice
entry.content:
To ensure all Travelers have the best-possible Genshin Impact experience, our developers will soon begin performing update maintenance. After this is complete, the game will update to a new version.

Read more on Version 2.1 "Floating World Under the Moonlight" Update Notice
entry.summary: To ensure all Travelers have the best-possible Genshin Impact experience, our developers will soon begin performing update maintenance. After this is complete, the game will update to a new version.

entry.title: "Moonlight Merriment" Event: Take part and exchange for the event-exclusive claymore Luxurious Sea-Lord
entry.content:
During the event, Travelers can complete quests in Moonchase Tales or take part in Moonlight Seeker and Trail of Delicacies challenges to obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Crown of Insight, Primogems, recipes, and more.

Read more on "Moonlight Merriment" Event: Take part and exchange for the event-exclusive claymore Luxurious Sea-Lord
entry.summary: During the event, Travelers can complete quests in Moonchase Tales or take part in Moonlight Seeker and Trail of Delicacies challenges to obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Crown of Insight, Primogems, recipes, and more.

entry.title: "Hyakunin Ikki" Event: A team-switching combat challenge awaits
entry.content:
During the event, take part in the free-for-all fighting tournament "Hyakunin Ikki" and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents in tag teams of two characters. By reaching the target scores, Travelers can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive namecard style "Celebration: Ikki", Primogems, and more.

Read more on "Hyakunin Ikki" Event: A team-switching combat challenge awaits
entry.summary: During the event, take part in the free-for-all fighting tournament "Hyakunin Ikki" and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents in tag teams of two characters. By reaching the target scores, Travelers can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive namecard style "Celebration: Ikki", Primogems, and more.

entry.title: "Lunar Realm" Event: Go fishing and obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod!
entry.content:
During the event, join Inazuman fisherwoman Kujirai Momiji on her journey to chase the moon, in pursuit of a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." After completing a series of quests and challenges, you can obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod "Moonstringer," Primogems, Mysterious Fish Furnishing, and other rewards.

Read more on "Lunar Realm" Event: Go fishing and obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod!
entry.summary: During the event, join Inazuman fisherwoman Kujirai Momiji on her journey to chase the moon, in pursuit of a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." After completing a series of quests and challenges, you can obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod "Moonstringer," Primogems, Mysterious Fish Furnishing, and other rewards.

entry.summary: Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!

None

entry.title: Character Demo - "Raiden Shogun: Judgment of Euthymia" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The sentimental cherry blossoms of days of yore have been stained with black. When thunder falls silent, the fleeting dream of an illusory bubble will be shattered.

Read more on Character Demo - "Raiden Shogun: Judgment of Euthymia" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: The sentimental cherry blossoms of days of yore have been stained with black. When thunder falls silent, the fleeting dream of an illusory bubble will be shattered.

entry.title: Dear Travelers, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site
entry.content:
Due to technical reasons, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site on September 1, 2021 at 06:00 (UTC+8). It is expected to reopen on September 1, 2021 at 11:00 (UTC+8).

Read more on Dear Travelers, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site
entry.summary: Due to technical reasons, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site on September 1, 2021 at 06:00 (UTC+8). It is expected to reopen on September 1, 2021 at 11:00 (UTC+8).

entry.title: "Hyakunin Ikki" Gameplay Details
entry.content:
A free-for-all fighting tournament called Hyakunin Ikki is being held in an unknown guild hall near Inazuma City. Take part and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents and earning scores to win challenge rewards.

Read more on "Hyakunin Ikki" Gameplay Details
entry.summary: A free-for-all fighting tournament called Hyakunin Ikki is being held in an unknown guild hall near Inazuma City. Take part and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents and earning scores to win challenge rewards.

entry.title: Explanations of Version 2.1 Update Details
entry.content:
Hello, Travelers! Paimon heard that in the new Version 2.1, Travelers will have new islands to explore! Paimon wants to go with you, maybe we'll make new friends along the way~ Seems like there's a lot of new game content to experience. Are you ready? Let's go together!

Read more on Explanations of Version 2.1 Update Details
entry.summary: Hello, Travelers! Paimon heard that in the new Version 2.1, Travelers will have new islands to explore! Paimon wants to go with you, maybe we'll make new friends along the way~ Seems like there's a lot of new game content to experience. Are you ready? Let's go together!

entry.title: The “Side by Side We Venture” Web Event Has Begun~ Journey With Returning and New Adventurers to Win Prizes!
entry.content:
The Adventurers' Guild has issued limited-time special commissions: Travelers can join hands with returning and new adventurers to complete commissions to get rewards!

Read more on The “Side by Side We Venture” Web Event Has Begun~ Journey With Returning and New Adventurers to Win Prizes!
entry.summary: The Adventurers' Guild has issued limited-time special commissions: Travelers can join hands with returning and new adventurers to complete commissions to get rewards!

entry.title: Collected Miscellany - "Raiden Shogun: Tranquil Thunder" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
A brief, solitary bolt of lightning can turn into an unrelenting force of divine retribution in the hands of the Raiden Shogun. Perhaps by rejecting the illusory bubble of the mortal world can one become closer to eternity.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Raiden Shogun: Tranquil Thunder" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: A brief, solitary bolt of lightning can turn into an unrelenting force of divine retribution in the hands of the Raiden Shogun. Perhaps by rejecting the illusory bubble of the mortal world can one become closer to eternity.

entry.title: Collected Miscellany - "Aloy: Mystical Glow of Frost" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
"The hunter named Aloy had many identities in her original world..." Oh, it would be too boring if I started the story like that~! After all, I'm not a rigid old man, am I? Leave it to me to study this nimble girl from another world!

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Aloy: Mystical Glow of Frost" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: "The hunter named Aloy had many identities in her original world..." Oh, it would be too boring if I started the story like that~! After all, I'm not a rigid old man, am I? Leave it to me to study this nimble girl from another world!

entry.title: Collected Miscellany - "Kujou Sara: Thunderstrike Feather" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The Crowfeather who came from the mountains and forests, turned into a swift Thunder Strike, steadfast to her mission of protecting Inazuma. A warrior who gives herself entirely to the land of Narukami, and devotes her body and soul by the will of the Shogun without any regrets.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Kujou Sara: Thunderstrike Feather" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: The Crowfeather who came from the mountains and forests, turned into a swift Thunder Strike, steadfast to her mission of protecting Inazuma. A warrior who gives herself entirely to the land of Narukami, and devotes her body and soul by the will of the Shogun without any regrets.

entry.title: Story Teaser: Promise of a People's Dream | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
A nation that surges ahead has become stuck in a fleeting shadow of a moment. Perhaps only if time stands still will Inazuma truly shine eternal... Using her blade, she purged all obstacles to Inazuma's progress, making a promise of a beautiful vision of eternity to her subjects. Such is the singular will of the Raiden Shogun over the land of Narukami.

Read more on Story Teaser: Promise of a People's Dream | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: A nation that surges ahead has become stuck in a fleeting shadow of a moment. Perhaps only if time stands still will Inazuma truly shine eternal... Using her blade, she purged all obstacles to Inazuma's progress, making a promise of a beautiful vision of eternity to her subjects. Such is the singular will of the Raiden Shogun over the land of Narukami.

entry.title: "Lunar Realm" Gameplay Details
entry.content:
An Inazuman fisherwoman, Kujirai Momiji, has always wanted to catch a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." She plans to assemble all her old friends and embark on a journey to find it — and she invites you to join her. Will she attain her wish this time?

Read more on "Lunar Realm" Gameplay Details
entry.summary: An Inazuman fisherwoman, Kujirai Momiji, has always wanted to catch a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." She plans to assemble all her old friends and embark on a journey to find it — and she invites you to join her. Will she attain her wish this time?

entry.title: GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey (Teaser 2)
entry.content:
Genshin Impact, in collaboration with a South Korean pop music group, teamed up to deliver a one-of-a-kind performance in this teaser for the online concert.

Read more on GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey  (Teaser 2)
entry.summary: Genshin Impact, in collaboration with a South Korean pop music group, teamed up to deliver a one-of-a-kind performance in this teaser for the online concert.

entry.title: "To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship." — "Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi
entry.content:
Hello Travelers~ Today, we'd like to introduce to you the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island — Sangonomiya Kokomi.

Read more on "To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship." — "Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi
entry.summary: Hello Travelers~ Today, we'd like to introduce to you the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island — Sangonomiya Kokomi.

entry.title: Character Teaser - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Ocean's Will" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
As the heir to the Sangonomiya line, she bears the responsibility of heeding the wishes of Watatsumi Island's people. Just as how the situation in battle can change a lot, so too can people's hearts. Faced with this, Kokomi knows that she has a long road ahead of her.

Read more on Character Teaser - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Ocean's Will" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: As the heir to the Sangonomiya line, she bears the responsibility of heeding the wishes of Watatsumi Island's people. Just as how the situation in battle can change a lot, so too can people's hearts. Faced with this, Kokomi knows that she has a long road ahead of her.

entry.title: Teyvat Adventures Commemorative Video: Travel Anniversary Letter | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
We have come a long way, over mountains, across seas and rivers, listening to the various songs of nature. As the sun and moon rise and fall, all these moments will be part of a song of adventure that will remain in our hearts forever.

Read more on Teyvat Adventures Commemorative Video: Travel Anniversary Letter | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: We have come a long way, over mountains, across seas and rivers, listening to the various songs of nature. As the sun and moon rise and fall, all these moments will be part of a song of adventure that will remain in our hearts forever.

entry.title: Character Demo - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: A Thousand Waves Under the Moon" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
Finding the right time and place is difficult, but bringing people together is more valuable. If the power of all living beings came together, even the creatures of the deep sea can see the stars.

Read more on Character Demo - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: A Thousand Waves Under the Moon" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: Finding the right time and place is difficult, but bringing people together is more valuable. If the power of all living beings came together, even the creatures of the deep sea can see the stars.

entry.title: Genshin Impact One Year Anniversary Community Event Rewards Preview
entry.content:
Time flies, a year has gone by, and Genshin Impact is about to turn one year old! Today, the Teyvat Hiking Association has brought you a rewards preview of the one year anniversary community events~

Read more on Genshin Impact One Year Anniversary Community Event Rewards Preview
entry.summary: Time flies, a year has gone by, and Genshin Impact is about to turn one year old! Today, the Teyvat Hiking Association has brought you a rewards preview of the one year anniversary community events~

entry.title: Duel in the Mist - Inazuma OST Battle Theme MV｜Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The Inazuma OST Battle Theme MV "Duel in the Mist" is performed by special guest top Japanese folk musicians.

entry.summary: The Inazuma OST Battle Theme MV "Duel in the Mist" is performed by special guest top Japanese folk musicians.

entry.title: Collected Miscellany - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: Secret Tides of the Heart" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The scenery of Watatsumi Island is reflected on the surface of the sparkling waves, as is the pensive silhouette of Kokomi. Having a plan is not just for ensuring victory but also a way of defense. This is her duty as the Divine Priestess, and also Sangonomiya Kokomi's own determination.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: Secret Tides of the Heart" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: The scenery of Watatsumi Island is reflected on the surface of the sparkling waves, as is the pensive silhouette of Kokomi. Having a plan is not just for ensuring victory but also a way of defense. This is her duty as the Divine Priestess, and also Sangonomiya Kokomi's own determination.

entry.title: "Travelers' Musings" — Behind the Scenes of the Music of Inazuma | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
This video tells the story of the Inazuma OST's creative philosophy, and documents the one and a half month of remote collaboration across cultures and languages between the Chinese and Japanese teams.

Read more on "Travelers' Musings" — Behind the Scenes of the Music of Inazuma | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: This video tells the story of the Inazuma OST's creative philosophy, and documents the one and a half month of remote collaboration across cultures and languages between the Chinese and Japanese teams.

entry.title: "Moonlight Merriment" Gameplay Details
entry.content:
The new event "Moonlight Merriment" is about to begin! The autumn moon shines bright, and Liyue Harbor is hard at work preparing for the traditional Moonchase Festival. The preparations for various activities based on the festival's theme are well underway.

Read more on "Moonlight Merriment" Gameplay Details
entry.summary: The new event "Moonlight Merriment" is about to begin! The autumn moon shines bright, and Liyue Harbor is hard at work preparing for the traditional Moonchase Festival. The preparations for various activities based on the festival's theme are well underway.

entry.title: GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey (Teaser 3)
entry.content:
Talented musicians from around the world, including Belgium, South Korea, and the United States, will showcase the unique charm of symphonic, pop and a cappella music, respectively, with their renditions of the melodious Genshin Impact soundtrack.

Read more on GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey  (Teaser 3)
entry.summary: Talented musicians from around the world, including Belgium, South Korea, and the United States, will showcase the unique charm of symphonic, pop and a cappella music, respectively, with their renditions of the melodious Genshin Impact soundtrack.

entry.title: Anniversary Web Event "An Unforgettable Journey" Now Online: Watch your own anniversary theater to obtain Primogems and other rewards
entry.content:
365 days and nights have passed, and the curtain is about to rise on the Anniversary Theater dedicated to you... Travelers can watch their personalized Anniversary Theater on the event page. After watching during the event period, Travelers will receive a viewing gift.

Read more on Anniversary Web Event "An Unforgettable Journey" Now Online: Watch your own anniversary theater to obtain Primogems and other rewards
entry.summary: 365 days and nights have passed, and the curtain is about to rise on the Anniversary Theater dedicated to you... Travelers can watch their personalized Anniversary Theater on the event page. After watching during the event period, Travelers will receive a viewing gift.

entry.title: Promotional Video - Together on a Long Journey | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The first ray of sun shines on the horizon, while the stars sparkle brightly. We went on a long journey in Teyvat together, and now a new adventure awaits us.

Read more on Promotional Video - Together on a Long Journey | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: The first ray of sun shines on the horizon, while the stars sparkle brightly. We went on a long journey in Teyvat together, and now a new adventure awaits us.

entry.title: Story Teaser: Flavors of the World | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The passing of time is marked by meals as we drink and make merry, blessed by nature's grace. From past to present, the years go by in the blink of an eye. Smoke of hearths brings us joy and domesticity paints a picture of everyday life. Delicate clouds chase the moon as the boat floats on the river of time.

Read more on Story Teaser: Flavors of the World | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: The passing of time is marked by meals as we drink and make merry, blessed by nature's grace. From past to present, the years go by in the blink of an eye. Smoke of hearths brings us joy and domesticity paints a picture of everyday life. Delicate clouds chase the moon as the boat floats on the river of time.

entry.content:

entry.title: Genshin Impact EP - He Who Wanders Untrammeled
entry.content:
As he wandered through the streets and alleyways lined by cherry blossom trees, a rare and pensive thought came to the young martial artist's mind. The answer he seeks lies in both the fierce momentum of battles and the journey awaiting him.

Read more on Genshin Impact EP - He Who Wanders Untrammeled
entry.summary: As he wandered through the streets and alleyways lined by cherry blossom trees, a rare and pensive thought came to the young martial artist's mind. The answer he seeks lies in both the fierce momentum of battles and the journey awaiting him.

entry.title: "Tuned to the World's Sounds" Gameplay Details
entry.content:
With the end of the incident in Inazuma, Kazuha follows The Crux and returns to Liyue. However, he has suddenly passed a short message along, requesting that his fellow sailors keep an eye out for you. Might he be in some sort of trouble...?

Read more on "Tuned to the World's Sounds" Gameplay Details
entry.summary: With the end of the incident in Inazuma, Kazuha follows The Crux and returns to Liyue. However, he has suddenly passed a short message along, requesting that his fellow sailors keep an eye out for you. Might he be in some sort of trouble...?

entry.title: "Labyrinth Warriors" Event: Take part to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro)!
entry.content:
During the event, you can obtain Aged Tokens upon completing the Mystic Onmyou Chamber. Aged Tokens can be exchanged in the event shop for Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora. If you meet all the requirements for Blazing Unison, you can exchange a number of Aged Tokens to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro).

Read more on "Labyrinth Warriors" Event: Take part to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro)!
entry.summary: During the event, you can obtain Aged Tokens upon completing the Mystic Onmyou Chamber. Aged Tokens can be exchanged in the event shop for Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora. If you meet all the requirements for Blazing Unison, you can exchange a number of Aged Tokens to invite "Blazing Riff" Xinyan (Pyro).

entry.summary: In addition to the GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 merchandise series, we have specially prepared accessories from the Wanderer's Troupe series. Don't miss it, Travelers~

entry.title: "Labyrinth Warriors" Gameplay Details
entry.content:
The great gates of the bizarre and unpredictable Mystic Onmyou Chamber imprison fierce monsters within them. Venture deep into this Domain by yourself and conquer the many perils within, assisting Shiki Taishou to retrieve the fragments of his memories, and you will be able to explore the past that has been sealed within the Domain — and obtain its various treasures in the meantime.

Read more on "Labyrinth Warriors" Gameplay Details
entry.summary: The great gates of the bizarre and unpredictable Mystic Onmyou Chamber imprison fierce monsters within them. Venture deep into this Domain by yourself and conquer the many perils within, assisting Shiki Taishou to retrieve the fragments of his memories, and you will be able to explore the past that has been sealed within the Domain — and obtain its various treasures in the meantime.

entry.title: Genshin Impact EP - Lingering Aroma of the Solitary Butterfly
entry.content:
The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor runs a special business, so it has always acted with great care, especially when it comes to rituals and ceremonies. However, when the undertakers study the rules rigorously, the Director is often nowhere to be seen. Where could this butterfly carrying a lingering aroma be found...

Read more on Genshin Impact EP - Lingering Aroma of the Solitary Butterfly
entry.summary: The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor runs a special business, so it has always acted with great care, especially when it comes to rituals and ceremonies. However, when the undertakers study the rules rigorously, the Director is often nowhere to be seen. Where could this butterfly carrying a lingering aroma be found...

entry.title: System Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
The update to Version 2.3 will take place on November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8). At the same time, routine maintenance of the internal accounts service system will also be carried out. Due to this, the Genshin Impact official website and in-game registration and payment features will be down temporarily. This maintenance will take approximately 40 minutes. We thank all Travelers for your patience and support.

Read more on System Maintenance Notice
entry.summary: The update to Version 2.3 will take place on November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8). At the same time, routine maintenance of the internal accounts service system will also be carried out. Due to this, the Genshin Impact official website and in-game registration and payment features will be down temporarily. This maintenance will take approximately 40 minutes. We thank all Travelers for your patience and support.

entry.title: Notice of Temporary Suspension of Payment Channels
entry.content:
Starting from November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8), we will carry out maintenance and adjustments on our internal payment platform. During the maintenance, American Express and JCB payment channels will be temporarily unavailable on the official Genshin Impact website and in the game. Both payment channels will be available again after the maintenance is complete. Please refer to the payment channels on the official website and in-game. You can also follow us on our official social media accounts t

Read more on Notice of Temporary Suspension of Payment Channels
entry.summary: Starting from November 24 at 06:00 a.m. (UTC+8), we will carry out maintenance and adjustments on our internal payment platform. During the maintenance, American Express and JCB payment channels will be temporarily unavailable on the official Genshin Impact website and in the game. Both payment channels will be available again after the maintenance is complete. Please refer to the payment channels on the official website and in-game. You can also follow us on our official social media accounts t

entry.title: "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Event: Take part and obtain the event-exclusive weapon, Cinnabar Spindle (Sword)
entry.content:
During the "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" event, take part in "Born of the Snow" gameplay and complete various challenges in the Dragonspine area to obtain Cinnabar Spindle (Sword). Collect Snowstrider Emblems and Mysterious Emblems to exchange for rewards such as event-exclusive Weapon Refinement Materials, Crown of Insight, Weapon Ascension Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mora, and Mystic Enhancement Ore from the Event Shop.

Read more on "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" Event: Take part and obtain the event-exclusive weapon, Cinnabar Spindle (Sword)
entry.summary: During the "Shadows Amidst Snowstorms" event, take part in "Born of the Snow" gameplay and complete various challenges in the Dragonspine area to obtain Cinnabar Spindle (Sword). Collect Snowstrider Emblems and Mysterious Emblems to exchange for rewards such as event-exclusive Weapon Refinement Materials, Crown of Insight, Weapon Ascension Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mora, and Mystic Enhancement Ore from the Event Shop.

entry.title: Genshin Impact EP - A Canvas of Soft Snow on Icy Peaks
entry.content:
A blizzard races over the mountain, concealing an enigmatic past. Memories are engraved on the earth, which give rise to nature's treasures. Everything comes to life with a light stroke of the brush.

Read more on Genshin Impact EP - A Canvas of Soft Snow on Icy Peaks
entry.summary: A blizzard races over the mountain, concealing an enigmatic past. Memories are engraved on the earth, which give rise to nature's treasures. Everything comes to life with a light stroke of the brush.

entry.title: Genshin Impact EP - Gentle Waves of Frost
entry.content:
Windswept cliffs, secluded forests, and snow at the foot of a mountain. Across the outskirts of Mondstadt lie the scattered footprints of the Spindrift Knight. But under the day's warm breeze, the dutiful Captain of the Reconnaissance Company would occasionally have a rest.

Read more on Genshin Impact EP - Gentle Waves of Frost
entry.summary: Windswept cliffs, secluded forests, and snow at the foot of a mountain. Across the outskirts of Mondstadt lie the scattered footprints of the Spindrift Knight. But under the day's warm breeze, the dutiful Captain of the Reconnaissance Company would occasionally have a rest.

entry.title: A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers
entry.content:
Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the " PlayStation®Partner Awards 2021 GRAND AWARD" and "PlayStation Game Music Award (1st Runner-Up)"! Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey. We will be giving out 800 Primogems from December 4 to December 7!

Read more on A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers
entry.summary: Thanks to your support, Genshin Impact has won the " PlayStation®Partner Awards 2021 GRAND AWARD" and "PlayStation Game Music Award (1st Runner-Up)"! Thank you for coming alongside us through this journey. We will be giving out 800 Primogems from December 4 to December 7!

entry.summary: To help Bantan Sango Detective Agency complete their investigations on "mass disappearances of little animals", follow your commission, and rescue animals in designated investigation locales.

entry.title: Character Teaser - "Arataki Itto: That's How the Show Should Go!" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
When the Arataki Gang is involved, even the most traditional repertoire may usher in a new twist. Although some in the audience have enjoyed such a surprise, it has caused quite the trouble for the Tenryou Commission. Let's see who will get the last laugh this time: Arataki Itto with his booming laughter, or the soldiers who are swift at maintaining law and order.

Read more on Character Teaser - "Arataki Itto: That's How the Show Should Go!" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: When the Arataki Gang is involved, even the most traditional repertoire may usher in a new twist. Although some in the audience have enjoyed such a surprise, it has caused quite the trouble for the Tenryou Commission. Let's see who will get the last laugh this time: Arataki Itto with his booming laughter, or the soldiers who are swift at maintaining law and order.

entry.title: Character Demo - "Arataki Itto: Make Way for the One and Oni!" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
The Vision, which was often carefully cleaned with flannel, had once been taken away from Arataki Itto. But Itto has never been discouraged. On the contrary, after overcoming various hardships to regain his elemental power, his fighting spirit has burned even brighter. Yes, that's right. I guess his mettle is exactly what makes him the boss of the Arataki Gang.

Read more on Character Demo - "Arataki Itto: Make Way for the One and Oni!" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: The Vision, which was often carefully cleaned with flannel, had once been taken away from Arataki Itto. But Itto has never been discouraged. On the contrary, after overcoming various hardships to regain his elemental power, his fighting spirit has burned even brighter. Yes, that's right. I guess his mettle is exactly what makes him the boss of the Arataki Gang.

entry.title: Collected Miscellany - "Arataki Itto: Supreme Superstrength" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
In the eyes of Arataki Itto, wielding a weapon on the battlefield is no different from a game of cards or beetle fighting with the neighborhood kids. Both require a serious approach for the outcome to be determined righteously. If you lose, you must quietly accept your loss, but if you win, you can reign supreme.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Arataki Itto: Supreme Superstrength" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: In the eyes of Arataki Itto, wielding a weapon on the battlefield is no different from a game of cards or beetle fighting with the neighborhood kids. Both require a serious approach for the outcome to be determined righteously. If you lose, you must quietly accept your loss, but if you win, you can reign supreme.

entry.title: Collected Miscellany - "Gorou: Forward Unto Victory" | Genshin Impact
entry.content:
Gorou's ability to repeatedly win on the perilous battlefield relies on planning ahead and improvisation. And his sincere heart that is determined to protect his companions.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Gorou: Forward Unto Victory" | Genshin Impact
entry.summary: Gorou's ability to repeatedly win on the perilous battlefield relies on planning ahead and improvisation. And his sincere heart that is determined to protect his companions.
